original_text: I will scatter them among nations that neither they nor their ancestors have known, and I will pursue them with the sword until I have made an end of them.”
korean_text: 그들과 그들의 조상이 알지 못하던 여러 나라 가운데에 그들을 흩어 버리고 진멸되기까지 그 뒤로 칼을 보내리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: I will scatter them among nations
that neither they nor their ancestors have known
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 그들의 조상들이 알지 못했던 나라들에

sentences.original_text: and I will pursue them with the sword
until I have made an end of them
